projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: A portfolio, React practice project, and a home base for all my pursuits. Enabled by a pipeline from GitHub to AWS for consistent, automatic deployment.

projects.title: Lab Rat
projects.description: Web game made for MizJam 1. All contestants had to create a game based on the same art assets in 48 hours. I wrote the code and music while Julianne Waber did level design and art direction.

projects.title: Central Park Conservancy Itinerary Builder
projects.description: Part of a volunteer team that built a prototype web application allowing visitors of Central Park to create personalized guided tours. I worked on the back-end with Python and AWS Lambda and DynamoDB.

projects.title: death ray of peace
projects.description: Wrote and recorded lo-fi music. I got to play lots of shows with friends. I'm honored when people put my music in their skate montages.
